scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Audiovisual series (1890-2011, undated) comprises photographs, computer floppy disks, microfilm, audio cassettes, and videos. The photographs primarily contain images of Jane Gentry Vance at events, family pictures, and Athens, Kentucky. Of note is a photo album with photos of Jane's aunt, Tommie House Kane, Kentucky's first female pilot, author from the 1920's.The 3½-inch floppy disks and microfilm primarily contain University English honors class handouts, records, and the department's creative writing journal. The audio cassettes and video tapings of interviews, presentations, and poetry readings. Also included are computer disks of Vance's 1989 paper with Louis Rubin and a DVD film of Hollins University tribute to Louis Rubin in 2011.
